rukus.text: Haja de niradharita mahine hana. Isa la'i jisa ne inham niradharita mahini'am vica haja da irada kara li'a tam phira usa ne haja de daurana na ko'i gadi gala karani hai ate na papa di, na lara'i jhagare di gala. Ate jo bhale karama tusim karoge, alaha nu usa da gi'ana ho javega ate tusim safara da kharaca lavo. Sabha tom vadhi'a kharaca takava (parahezagari) da hai ate he budhi vali'o! Mere tom daro

Isa vica ko'i papa nahim_ki tusim apane raba da fazala (kirapa) talasa karom. Phira jadom tusim loka â€œaraphataâ€tom vapisa hovo tam alaha nu masa'are-e-harama de nere yada karo ate usa nu yada karo jisa tar'ham alaha ne tuhanu dasi'a hai isa tom pahilam nisacita hi' tusim bhatake ho'e lokam vicom si
Phira parikarama suru karo. Jithom sabha loka calana ate alaha tom mu'afi mago asala vica alaha khima dena vala hai, rahima karana vala hai

Phira jadom tusim apane haja de manasika (haja di parikri'a) pura kara lavo tam alaha nu yada karom jisa tar'ham tusim pahilam apane bapa dadi'am nu yada karade si. Sagom usa tom vi zi'ada. Lokam vicom ko'i manukha kahida hai, he sade raba! Sanu vaise sasara vica sabha kujha de ate praloka vica usa da kujha hisa nahim
Ate ko'i bada hai, jihara kahida hai, he sade palanahara! Sanu sasara vica neki de ate praloka vica vi neki de ate sanu aga de azaba to' baca
Unham lokam de la'i hisa' hai, unham de kite da (dovam sathanam-loka te praloka) la'i ate alaha jaladi hi hisaba laina vala hai

Ate alaha nu niradharita kite dina vica yada karo. Phira jihara bada jaladi hi do dinam vica maka vapasa a jave. Usa upara ko'i papa nahim ate jihara bada ruka jave usa upara vi ko'i papa nahim. Iha usa la'i hai jihara alaha tom dare ate tusim alaha tom darade raho ate cagi tar'ham jana lavo ki tusim usa de kola ikathe kite javoge
Ate lokam vicom ko'i ajiha hai ki usa di gala isa sasarika jivana vica tuhanu bhali pratita hudi hai ate uha apane dila di gala upara alaha nu gavaha bana'unda hai, halanki uha bahuta jhagaralu hai
Ate jadom uha muha pherada hai tam uha isa yatana vica rahida hai ki uha dharati upara phasada phailave ate khetam ate pranam nu nasata kare, halanki alaha phasada nu pasada nahim karada
Ate jadom usa nu kiha janda hai ki alaha tom dara. Tam hakara usa nu papa upara jama dida hai, ajihe bade la'i naraka nisacata hai ate uha bahuta bura tikana hai
Ate lokam vicom ko'i ajiha hai ki alaha di prasanata di talasa vica uha apane panam nu nichavara kara dida hai ate alaha apane badi'am upara bahuta rahima vala hai
He imana vali'o! Isalama vica pure de pure lina ho ja'u ate saitana de pada-cinham upara na calom uha tuhada pratakha dusamana hai
Jekara tusim' til'haka ja'um isa tom ba'ada ki tuhade kola sapasata taraka a zuke hana tam jana lavo alaha asima sakatisali hai ate sarava- gi'ata hai
Ki loka isa udika vica hana ki alaha (khuda) badalam di cham vica ave ate farisate vi a jana ate mamale da phaisala kara dita jave ate sare mamale alaha vala hi maure jande hana
